quest.Name: Hunting the Hunter
quest.Accomplishment: You stalked the Reef for the Encampment of the Witch-Hunter General, and put it to the sword.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= destroyed the forces of the Witch-Hunters of Oudin in Qud.
quest.Gospel: In a bloody campaign, =name= destroyed the Witch Hunters of the Putus Templar, putting their cities to the sword. In honour of their great victory, the Naphtaali Tribe <spice.history.gospels.Celebration.LateSultanate.!random>.

step.Name: Return to Qolohish
step.text: Return to Qolohish and tell him of your success.
